main event: Two residents observed a round orange glowing object moving slowly in a straight line at high altitude over Warner Robins Air Force Base on January 7, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as round, orange in color, with no sound or exhaust trail,The sighting lasted from 2232Z to 2235Z,The observers included a civilian electrician employed at the Air Force Base and his wife,The weather conditions were clear with 15 miles visibility at the time of the sighting,No meteorological activity that could account for the sighting was present.
witness description: a civilian employed at the Air Force Base as an electrician and his wife
